animeDescription: A simple story about a young boy who stays up on Christmas in order to catch Santa and show the proof to his older friends.
animeStaff: [['Itou Yuuichi', ['Director', 'Spotting']], ['Akashiya Sanma', ['Script', 'Executive Producer', 'Original Creator']], ['Hiramatsu Eri', ['Theme Song Composition', 'Theme Song Performance', 'Theme Song Lyrics', 'Music']]]
